name: Angry Baby Zombie Killer FREE - Walking, Run, Jump and Shoot Game
name_original: Angry Baby Zombie Killer FREE - Walking, Run, Jump and Shoot Game
description:
*** WARNING: Not for little kids! ***

Yeah baby! After your mother is brutally murdered by zombies it’s time for baby to exact his revenge.

Grab a gun and join da party on a zombie shooting rampage :-)

SWEET FEATURES:

• Multiplayer or single player zombie blasting fun!
• Upgrade weapons and levels
• Awesome heavy metal soundtrack
• Gruesome graphics

Download NOW 100% FREE!
